query: WITH entities AS (SELECT collateralization_ratio, id FROM core_credit_facilities WHERE (COALESCE((collateralization_ratio, id) > ($3, $2), $2 IS NULL)) ORDER BY collateralization_ratio ASC, id ASC LIMIT $1) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: Repo__Id", e.sequence, e.event, CASE WHEN $4 THEN e.context ELSE NULL::jsonb END as "context: es_entity::ContextData", e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_credit_facility_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.collateralization_ratio asc, i.id asc, i.id, e.sequence
